short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for one to fill-up username / passwords of Gmail automatically in single click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a Gmail password saver. Save all Gmail username and password and automatically login to Gmail with single click without manually typing username and password. You can also export all Gmail accounts' username and password in an excel file with single click. This is secure Email password saver.
